00049 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_USER            0
00050 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_CA              1
00051 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_ROOT            2
00052 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_PKEY            3
00053 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_CONFIG          4
00054 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_CERT_TYPE(x)    ((x) & 0xf)
00055 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_MILESTONE       0
00056 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_RESULT          0x10
00057 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_CALL_TYPE(x)    ((x) & TQSL_CERT_CB_RESULT)
00058 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_PROMPT          0
00059 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_DUPLICATE       0x100
00060 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_ERROR           0x200
00061 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_LOADED          0x300
00062 #define TQSL_CERT_CB_RESULT_TYPE(x)  ((x) & 0x0f00)
